Hi,

just been doing some crawling with Heretrix-1.2 - I was using the 
refresh on
the logs page to watch its progress. When the crawl finished I got a 404:

it had tried to go to http://www.wap100.bl.uk/... rather than 
http://wap100.bl.uk/...
which is the machine I was crawling on.

Nothing important - just thought it worth noting.

cheers

mark
